title: Victor: Her Ruthless Owner
description: The opposite of love isn't hate. It's Victor.My boyfriend's back. But not like before.He used to be a mafia prince. Now he's a king. Dark, cruel, and commanding.My father destroyed his, and the payback price for that is ten years of ownership.“Ownership? Ownership of what? What could I possibly have that you want?” I asked him when I was still innocent.His smile was so malicious as he answered, "You."Then he presented me with a shackle disguised as a wedding ring.So I'm his prisoner now. Can I survive his marriage sentence? Can my heart?
author: Theodora Taylor
